      • isNotificationEnabled

        boolean isNotificationEnabled(Context context)
        Return true if the SDK will be able to receive notifications, false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        Returns:
        true if the SDK will be able to receive notifications, false otherwise.

      • enableNotification

        void enableNotification(Context context)
        Enable the SDK to receive notifications.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.

      • disableNotification

        void disableNotification(Context context)
        Disables the SDK to receive notifications.
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.

      • isDefaultNotificationsEnabled

        boolean isDefaultNotificationsEnabled(Context context)
        Checks if default notification handling is enabled
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        Returns:
        true if default notification handling is enabled or false otherwise.

      • enableDefaultNotification

        void enableDefaultNotification(Context context,
                             boolean enable)
        Enables/disables default notification handling
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        enable - true if default notification handling should be enabled and false otherwise.

      • setCustomNotificationLayout

        void setCustomNotificationLayout(Context context,
                               java.lang.String layoutName,
                               int layoutId,
                               int textViewId,
                               int imageViewId,
                               int... actionViewIds)
        Registers a custom expandable notification layout
        Parameters:
        context - The application's context.
        layoutName - The name under which the layout will be registered
        layoutId - The layout id
        textViewId - The id of the text view element (0 for no text element)
        imageViewId - The id of the image view element (0 for no imag element)
        actionViewIds - A list of up to 3 element ids that will server as the action triggers. The on click operation of these elements will be set to activate the action and for every element which is also a text element, the element's text will be set as the action name.

      • getNotificationsPreference

        NotificationsPreference getNotificationsPreference()
        Retrieves the notifications preference configuration class.
        Returns:
        The notification preference configuration class
